roleset.name: summon, make allusions to
roleset.note: EVOKE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'evoke' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. No comparison. (from evoke.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: So if index arbitrage is simply taking advantage of thin inefficiencies between two markets for the same widget, how did ``program trading'' evolve into the evil creature that *trace* is evoking the curses of so many observers?
example.arg: the curses of so many observers

example.name: ARG2
example.text: The P100 is more dispersed and its latency is more variable than is the case when [the response]-1 is evoked *trace*-1 with a fast optomechanical stimulator.
